content: komrades ! good ...ehh.... +8 hours. I now, think back in time, to remember my homeland history. So, the question is - why Germans give their girls for our Tsars? How democratic a father can be - to send his daughter to be wife of <who is mr,<tsar>?... true democrat, i think. SO... they were intrested in Russia. They were pragmatic. Orthodox white state, huge territory, mostly calm people, who always !!! always DEFEND own territory, not attack. First man in space. Soon after the most CRUEL war in Russian history. WE ARE THE NATION, AMERICANS ! as soon you realize that - you will know that we should be friends. We arent the nation, who looks up at someone. Commies just told us that we shouldnt be worst then americans. Well... our jets, ICBMs, nuke subs, sattelites, bunkers, AA systems, naval battlecruisers. And Arctic question ))) Americans , tell me please, how much ice ...hmmm breakers? destroyers? do you have ? ... Russia has some. damn... not so good but our own. Remember we put down our OWN orbital station. Yes, its just the same you watch in movie. Where drunk russian pilot, with GAETCHNIY KLUTCH and USHANKA ... steam everywhere. Flying trashcan. and you belive. You think Russians are just the same. and many in Russia belive. its been a long time i try to find in the net Russian-Slavic trance. Electronic music. Its so popular now. Many arabic musicians do so. National+modern electronic. well... thinka haveto finish for now. Sorry for long time no post, (who cares). =))) crizis ))) damn it ))) world wide

content: sheridan sorry )) i just forget to answer to you at this mess. well, im still on my work. and lloking forward, to have some IF ... you know ))) im fired. So, evenings i dirve my car over the Moscow, ) to have some more money. Actually, )) often for evening beer and cigarettes and gazoline. Moscow is full of people. Many nationalities. Many gangs. If some Russian kills someone - often sounds FASCISM ! even if he just stand for his girl. Its not the facts i tell, just my feeling of that. Unemployment. Not so good, americans for sure. content: skytail, Sorry to wonder off your topic, but I have a question for you if you don't mind. Is is safe for Americans to travel to Moscow and St. Petersburg? Things sound kind of scary over there with neo-nazis and gangs on the streets. Since you live there, your opinion would be appreciated. I have always wanted to see the National Museum in Moscow, and Red Square/Kremlin. No one starts a war--or rather, no one in his senses ought to do so--without first being clear in his mind what he intends to achieve by that war and how he intends to conduct it. Carl von Clausewitz
